name: Planet Defender (itch) (wolfemen1026)
description:
Hi! I'm a 16 year old trying to become a full-time game dev. This is my first time participating in a game jam, along with my first (mostly complete) game I've made. I hope you enjoy it! 

Try to defend the planet from as many asteroids as possible! You can also use the cash you make to buy perks. Use A and D to move around the planet, and left click to shoot.
